lead_paragraph: The British Mail Packet Bolivia, Captain WILLIAMS, from Valparalso and intermediate ports, ar rived at Panama on the 10th Sept. The dates from Valparaiso are to the 25th August. Of the loan of $300,000 asked for by the Chilian government, only $70,000 had been taken-$50,000 by Haugh Gruning, and $20,000 by Henry Wyman-all at 8 pecent., which is now the legal rate of interest in Chili.
